english: Good afternoon , camilla . are you here by yourself
chinese: 午安，卡蜜拉你一个人在家吗？

english: Anna : good afternoon . i ' d like to buy this car
chinese: 安娜：午安。我想买这一辆车子。

english: Tom ? good afternoon , jack . how ' s life treating you
chinese: 汤姆?午安，杰克。你过得如何？

english: Good afternoon , madam . what can i do for you
chinese: 女士，午安，我能为您做些什么？

english: Waiter : good afternoon . are you ready to order
chinese: 服务生：午安。您准备好要点餐了吗？
午安造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Tom ： good afternoon , claire . how ' s the baby
chinese: 汤姆：午安，克莱儿。宝宝好吗？

english: John ： good afternoon , bob . how was your morning
chinese: 约翰：午安，鲍勃。早上过得怎麽样？

english: Anna : good afternoon . i ' d like to buy this car
chinese: 安娜：午安，我想买这部车。

english: Receptionist : good afternoon . have you an appointment
chinese: 传达员：午安。您和他约好了吗？

english: Good afternoon , sir . may i see your passport , please
chinese: 午安，先生。请出示您的护照好吗
午安,先生们.奥尔根上尉

english: Good afternoon . star enterprises . how can i help you
chinese: 午安，这里是明星企业。我能怎麽效劳呢？

english: Good afternoon . i ' ll be your travel guide
chinese: 两位午安我是你们的导游

english: Good afternoon , madam . may i help you
chinese: 午安，太太，我可以帮你吗？

english: Good afternoon . fortune restaurant . may i help you
chinese: 午安，红双喜餐厅。请问有什么可以为你效劳
